message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $200 to start. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $120 is a bit too low, I'm willing to come down to $170. This product is really worth it, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $170 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
